Mission Statement
The Swarm Development Group (SDG) was founded in September 1999 as a private, not-for-profit
The primary purpose of this organization is exclusively charitable, scientific or educational within the meaning of Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 or such other provisions of state or federal law as may from time to time be applicable.
organization to support the development of the Swarm Simulation System (Swarm) and the interests of the group members. The purpose of the SDG is to:
advance the state-of-the-art in multi agent based simulation through the continued advancement of the Swarm Simulation System and support of the Swarm user community
promote the free interchange of multi agent based simulations among computing specialists and the public
develop and maintain the integrity and competence of individuals engaged in the practice of agent based simulation.
If you are interested in becoming a member, please Contact Us.
